REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0553 reute h f BC-FRASER-AND-NEAVE-LTD 06-29 0059

TEXT.TITLE: FRASER AND NEAVE LTD <FRNM.SI> HALF YR TO MARCH 31
TEXT.BODY:
Shr 15.8 cents vs 12.9 cents Int div six cents vs same Group net 19.90 mln dlrs vs 16.25 mln Turnover 390.70 vs 381.60 mln NOTE - Div pay Aug 3, register July 31. Co says it expects results for the second half year to be similar to those of the first half.
REUTER
